name: Puff Pastry Quiche with Tuna
author: nt_bella
summary: This is a wonderful savory puff pastry quiche with tuna, creme fraiche, mayo, cheese, and tomatoes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon prepared mustard, or to taste
1 (8 ounce) can chunk light tuna in water, drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
3 sprigs fresh dill, finely chopped, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a springform pan with parchment paper
Roll out puff pastry on a lightly floured surface
Line the prepared springform pan with puff pastry and pierce all over with a fork
Add another piece of parchment paper and cover with a layer of dried beans to keep pastry flat while baking
Prebake pastry in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Spread puff pastry with a thin layer of mustard
Place tuna into a bowl and mix with mayonnaise
Spread mixture onto puff pastry crust
Combine creme fraiche and eggs in a separate bowl
Stir in Swiss cheese and season with salt and pepper
Pour over tuna mixture and cover with tomato slices
Bake in the preheated oven until filling has set and pastry is golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes
